titles.title: End Polluter Welfare Act of 2025
End Polluter Welfare Act of 2025
To eliminate certain subsidies for fossil-fuel production.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on Transportation and Infrastructure, Natural Resources, Science, Space, and Technology, Energy and Commerce, Agriculture, Appropriations, Financial Services, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
